headline: Ask HN: Raspberry Pi (Linux) vs. ESP (RTOS) for IoT Use Cases
description: I want to connect a local system to the Cloud using an extra device like an ESP or Raspberry Pi. What would you prefer? Embedded RTOS (running on the ESP32) or a full GOS like Alpine Linux(running on the Pi 4)? It only has to handle some UART reading, a bit of string modification and a MQTT connection to the cloud. Honestly I don't think I need a full blown GOS for that. It also would make the system more complicated and increase the fault surface. Am I missing some points?

description_zh-Hans: 我想用一个额外的设备如ESP或Raspberry Pi将本地系统连接到云端。你喜欢什么？嵌入式RTOS（在ESP32上运行）还是像Alpine Linux（在Pi 4上运行）这样的完整GOS？它只需要处理一些UART的读取，一些字符串的修改和与云的MQTT连接。老实说，我不认为我需要一个完整的GOS来处理这个问题。这也会使系统更加复杂，增加故障面。我是不是漏掉了一些要点？
description_zh-Hant: 我想用一個額外的設備如ESP或Raspberry Pi將本地系統連接到雲端。你喜歡什麼？嵌入式RTOS（在ESP32上運行）還是像Alpine Linux（在Pi 4上運行）這樣的完整GOS？它只需要處理一些UART的讀取，一些字符串的修改和與雲的MQTT連接。老實說，我不認為我需要一個完整的GOS來處理這個問題。這也會使系統更加複雜，增加故障面。我是不是漏掉了一些要點？
